column3:
Yeah I also considered this at some point.

See the depends mechanism in master, it does a similar thing but for all dependencies not just bdb.

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/depends/README.usage
Very cool!  I did not realize this existed; thank you for the heads-up.  (I was tinkering with an old version (0.9.1), and sent this pull request by accident.)\n
